attributes.action: Theresa May Walk away from the EU NOW
attributes.additional_details: 52 percent of the public and more now are wanting to leave the EU
attributes.background: With more and more people supporting brexit now and others realising the generous deals we offer and that we don't actually legally owe, are being ignored and EU leaders demanding more.It is time to WALK AWAY NOW. We do not owe them a thing. Please listen to the majority public.
